name: TNPDefaultRuleset
description: TNP standard set of code analyzers rules

rules.justification: [Variable declarations should be ordered by type] --> Order is not so important for us
[The FlowField ... of ... should be added to the SIFT key.] --> Broken, raises false alarms
[Variable '...' with placeholders should have a comment explaining their content] It is required for transaltion, we are not doing it in projects.
[The page '...' should use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable.]
Using Object IDs in code is not allowed
